lst.name: sentence
lst.str: He said, "the decision was also taken to build up loan loss reeserves by making a sizeable increase in the charges for general provisions for commercial and cross border risks."

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: K. Businesses was "well maintained, although the reported result was affected by cross border debt provisioning," while Californian subsidiary Union Bank "showed continued growth."

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: "The continuing serious recessionary conditions in Singapore and Malaysia and the depressed condition of the shipping industry made it necessary to provide heavily against bad and doubtful debs arising from loans in the Asia Pacific region, on top of the normal level of provisioning," Barber said.
